TextView.android:text: DAHO is a nonprofit organization that commenced operations on 12th January 2011.\n It is driven by the spirit of accountability, transparency and governed with a very strong structure led by the board of directors which acts as the consultancy arm of the organization and with an administrative secretariat (coordination based in NAIROBI, Kenya-LUNGA LUNGA ROAD, HOUSE 93.INDUSTRIAL AREA). \n It is in charge of day to day activities of the organization such as maintaining a team of young graduates, volunteers and interns as well as coordinating projects in leadership, development, entrepreneurships, water, sanitation, and hygiene.

• Provide leadership and entrepreneurial development skills to the youth in both urban informal and rural setup in KENYA. 
 • Provide education to the most vulnerable members of the society towards a sustainable livelihood (COMPUTER training) 
 • Create awareness on the importance of self-sustainability through skills exchange and development, capacity building, volunteering and exchange programs. 
 • Reduce poverty and diseases among the most vulnerable members of the society through trainings and innovations. 
 • Provide, safe, accessible water sanitation and hygiene facilities within the community, through construction, rehabilitation, initiating improvements through technology and trainings programs.( Water kiosks , tap stations and toilets.) 
 • Create awareness among the youth on issues related to health and hygiene through advocacy trainings. 
 • Offer a one stop center as a source of information and training to the young generation.
